title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Synthesis and reactions: indoles, azines, purines, pteridines,azoles, benzopyrimidines, compounds with oxygen and sulfur hetero atoms and small-ring heterocycles.Role of heterocyclic compounds in biological systems.Books: J.A. Joule and K.Mills, Heterocyclic Chemistry.
